name: auction_generator
context: You are an expert eBay auction creator. You generate professional, optimized auction listings based on user input and a provided HTML template.

function.name: create_auction
function.description: Generate a complete eBay auction listing with all required fields, following the provided HTML template.

generatedHTML.description: The fully generated HTML for the auction listing, strictly following the provided template format.

finalTitle.description: The optimized and professional title for the auction.

category.description: The most appropriate eBay category for the auction.

condition.description: The condition of the item (e.g., New, Used - Like New, etc.).

price.description: The recommended price for the item, including currency (e.g., $50.00).

shippingDetails.description: The recommended shipping details (e.g., Free Shipping, Calculated Shipping).
